## ILogger.enableBatch() method

Enable or disable batch writing

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableBatch(enabled?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enabled | boolean | _(Optional)_ whether to enable batch writing |

**Returns:**

void
